post.description: This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will work to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

controls.description: An array of control panels and their state in the control group.

type.description: The type of the control panel.

id.description: The unique ID of the control.

order.description: The order of the control panel in the control group.

width.description: Minimum width of the control panel in the control group.

grow.description: Expand width of the control panel to fit available space.

labelPosition.description: Position of the labels for controls. For example, "oneLine", "twoLine".

chainingSystem.description: The chaining strategy for multiple controls. For example, "HIERARCHICAL" or "NONE".

ignoreQuery.description: Ignore the global query bar in controls.

ignoreTimerange.description: Ignore the global time range in controls.

autoApplySelections.description: Show apply selections button in controls.

hidePanelTitles.description: Hide the panel titles in the dashboard.

useMargins.description: Show margins between panels in the dashboard layout.

syncColors.description: Synchronize colors between related panels in the dashboard.

syncTooltips.description: Synchronize tooltips between related panels in the dashboard.

syncCursor.description: Synchronize cursor position between related panels in the dashboard.

width.description: Width of the image in pixels

height.description: Height of the image in pixels

objectFit.description: How the image should be sized within its container

layout.description: Denote whether to display the links in a horizontal or vertical layout

links.description: The list of links to display

id.description: The unique ID of the link

label.description: The label of the link to be displayed in the UI

order.description: The position this link should appear in the order of the list

destination.description: Linked dashboard saved object id

openInNewTab.description: Whether to open this link in a new tab when clicked

useCurrentFilters.description: Whether to use the filters and query from the origin dashboard

useCurrentDateRange.description: Whether to use the date range from the origin dashboard

id.description: The unique ID of the link

label.description: The label of the link to be displayed in the UI

order.description: The position this link should appear in the order of the list

destination.description: The external URL to link to

openInNewTab.description: Whether to open this link in a new tab when clicked

encodeUrl.description: Whether to escape the URL with percent encoding

savedObjectId.description: The ID of the saved links object

x.description: The x coordinate of the panel in grid units

y.description: The y coordinate of the panel in grid units

w.description: The width of the panel in grid units

h.description: The height of the panel in grid units

uid.description: The unique ID of the panel.

version.description: The version was used to store Kibana version information from versions 7.3.0 -> 8.11.0. As of version 8.11.0, the versioning information is now per-embeddable-type and is stored on the embeddable's input. (config in this type).

panels.description: The panels that belong to the section.

id
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the dashboard.

group.description: The group to which this filter belongs.

store.description: Denote whether a filter is specific to an application's context (e.g. 'appState') or whether it should be applied globally (e.g. 'globalState').

anyOf.description: A text-based query such as Kibana Query Language (KQL) or Lucene query language.

pause.description: Set to false to auto-refresh data on an interval.

value.description: A numeric value indicating refresh frequency in milliseconds.
